Thanks for hearing that Sharon, it was a reverse file too!=C2=A0 So, glad y=
ou told me you can hear it, very few seem to be able to, Steve says he can'=
t hear it either :(=C2=A0 I was beginning to wonder if I were going nuts or=
 something, I mean when no one acknowledges they hear it too what is a pers=
on to think,=C2=A0 you know?=C2=A0 Tim couldn't hear it until I slowed it d=
own, then he says, it's a "class C EVP"=C2=A0 probably is because it was hi=
dden in reverse, but when I reversed the whole file it popped out like a so=
re thumb! 
 sf

 



-----Original Message-----

Subject: [EVP-ITC=

          =C2=A0                                =
   Snowfire L =C2=A0- I heard the one you attached:=C2=A0 "You searched for=
 me - will you trust me" - excellent!
   =C2=A0
   Sharon from SF

<font color=3D"black"><font size=3D"2"><font face=3D"arial">Thanks for hear=
ing that Sharon, it was a reverse file too!  So, glad you told me you =
can hear it, very few seem to be able to, Steve says he can't hear it eithe=
r :(  I was beginning to wonder if I were going nuts or something, I m=
ean when no one acknowledges they hear it too what is a person to think,&nb=
sp; you know?  Tim couldn't hear it until I slowed it down, then he sa=
ys, it's a "class C EVP"  probably is because it was hidden in reverse=
, but when I reversed the whole file it popped out like a sore thumb! <br>
